p: To evaluate the antisecretory effect of (-)-fenchone was used the intestinal fluid accumulation model (enteropooling) induced by castor oil. The results show that (-)-fenchone did not reverse the accumulation of fluid caused by the inducing agent. It can suppose that the antidiarrheal effect of this monoterpene does not involve antisecretory and pro-absorptive mechanisms. This result differs the Sisay et al[ 53], in which the extract of Verbena officiinalis rich in terpenoids, had an inhibitory effect on enteropooling induced by castor oil.
